Draft Rating:

F

Carl Scheer ranks in the 6th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Scheer's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 16 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Robert Smith with 65th pick but was worth 51th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Benoit Benjamin with 3th pick but was worth 58th pick.
  • Drafted Marvin Webster with 3th pick but was worth 22th pick.
  • Drafted Tom LaGarde with 9th pick but was worth 60th pick.

Trade Rating:

B-

Carl Scheer ranks in the 63th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Alex English, Carl Nicks to DEN.
  • Lost George McGinnis to IND.
Their biggest L:
  • Added T.R. Dunn, Howard Carter to DEN.
  • Lost Clyde Drexler, Steve Colter to POR.

Signing Rating:

Their worst signings:
